item.title: Experienced Video Editor for vintage American Lifestyle YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced video editor to join our team.

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in video editing for the vintage American lifestyle Niche, similar channel to this channel:

Vintage lifestyle USA - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DOlyOXBZmQ

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full- time/retainer opportunity.

Please only apply if you already work on other YouTube Channels.

Looking forward to working with you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Documentary, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Documentary, Video Post-Editing
Country: ARE

item.title: Create unboxing videos using our raw footage. - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, we need someone to create two unboxing videos using our raw footage. We filmed the unboxing of a product/kit that was shipped in a large crate. We have 24 minutes of raw video footage shot vertically in 1280 x 720 on an iPhone 14 Pro.

Create one video under a minute in length suitable for social, and another version anywhere from 2-5 minutes. The short video can have music (no spoken words). The longer video can use the unboxer's comments.


Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Full Time Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and reliable video editor proficient in CapCut or a similar video editing program to join our team. The ideal candidate will create high-converting, engaging ads for Facebook and TikTok, both for our e-commerce brand and other clients.

Responsibilities:

Create 2-8 videos per week, each under 60 seconds
Deliver videos within 6 hours notice
Perform simple edits to produce high-quality, engaging ads
Use thick subtitles on key words to enhance viewer engagement
Implement minimal sound design to maintain focus on the content
Requirements:

Proficiency in CapCut or equivalent video editing software
Proven experience in creating engaging ads for Facebook and TikTok
Ability to work efficiently and meet tight deadlines
Strong understanding of what makes an ad high-converting
Excellent attention to detail and creativity
Work Details:

Full-time position
Flexible work location
If you are passionate about video editing and have a knack for creating ads that capture attention and drive conversions, we would love to hear from you!

How to Apply:

Please submit your portfolio showcasing relevant work along with a brief description of your experience and why you would be a good fit for this role.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$35.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 15:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Content Creator for Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Video Content Creator to produce short and engaging videos for our social media platforms. As our Video Content Creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, and editing videos that effectively communicate our brand message and engage our target audience. Your main focus will be creating videos for various social media channels such as Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of social media trends and be able to generate innovative ideas for video content.

Here are some examples we like. We have the text we want, you'd create video + audio -

https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8r4QJJpgyC/?igsh=cWFveHg5cHZpenk5
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6YpUi4Rr5Q/?igsh=aHJoejAyNGtrMmR4
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C75AkVXsX7J/?igsh=d2V3aHJ0ZmZ1dGF3
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7f5mqHuNtb/?igsh=YjZxYWYxeXExamVy
https://www.instagram.com/tv/CkySL2TOZNx/?igsh=cGMzaXFjM3N6b2Fv

   Skills required:
   - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Experience in shooting and editing short videos for social media
   - Knowledge of current social media platforms and trends
   - Excellent storytelling and visual communication skills
   - Ability to work under tight deadlines and deliver high-quality videos

   This is a medium-sized project that requires a commitment of 1 to 3 months.

   Expertise Level: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Need an editor that can piece together content for high quality story-telling ads - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a video editor specializing in content editing and story-telling for UGC video ads. You will pull content from all over the internet to sync up with a video audio (usually AI voice or female voice). Please send me your previous work if you have worked with UGC creators or have video editing work where you piece together footage to create a story for products and video ads.

I have attached an example of a good video ad so you have an idea of what type of videos are expected to be created. If you think you quality, please send your work.

item.title: Short form content (Youtube Shorts) Editor. - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Short Form Content Faceless Editor

Company: Oud. Media
Location: Remote
Type: Part-time/ Full-time

Experience: 1+ years in video editing and content creation

Responsibilities:
Edit and create engaging short-form video content with a focus on faceless videos using CapCut, 7 days a week.
Ensure consistency in style and branding across all content.

Requirements:
Proven experience in creating and editing short-form video content, with a portfolio showcasing expertise in faceless video production.
Strong proficiency in video editing software (e.g., CapCut, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Ability to articulate why you are the perfect fit for this role.

Preferred Qualifications:
Familiarity with platforms like Youtube, TikTok and Instagram.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
Creative mindset and attention to detail.

How to Apply:
Interested candidates should submit their resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining their relevant experience and why they are the ideal candidate for the Short Form Content Faceless Editor position.

Add: "i Love content" on top of the application. Otherwise it will be neglected.

Thank you

Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Faceless Health YouTube Video Creator and Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual to create and edit faceless health-related YouTube videos. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of health topics and be able to communicate complex information in a visually engaging and accessible way. This role requires strong video editing skills, as well as the ability to research and develop compelling content ideas. The chosen candidate will be responsible for creating high-quality videos that adhere to our brand guidelines and resonate with our target audience.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Knowledge of health-related topics
- Ability to research and gather information
- Strong creativity and storytelling skills
- Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

This is a medium-sized project that will span over 3 to 6 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level professional who can bring their expertise to create engaging and informative videos.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video, Education
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: DAVINCI Resolve ONLY - Video Editor Storytelling / Commercial - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there, we're looking for someone that wants adores video editing and all things in post. There are a few projects that I'd like to discuss to work together on.

1) Cutting & Editing

2) Color Grading (This would be great if not, at least cutting and editing)

3) Proficient in DaVinci Resolve

We're a production house in Austin Texas. We work on features, short films, music videos, and commercials. We have too much work and need someone that we can work with to get things done.

What I am not looking for -
I am not looking for a person who has an entrepreneur mindset. I am not looking for a one-and-done mindset. I want someone who is technical, loves to work on post-production/editing, and is content with growing in that field.

If you're interested in consistent work then we can help, we are drowning in editing right now and we need your help but only if you're a fit. Thank you so much for your time.

Hourly Range: $35.00-$150.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Compositing, Rotoscoping, Visual Effects, DaVinci Resolve, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Color Grading, Compositing, Rotoscoping, Visual Effects, DaVinci Resolve, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Video Producer for 3D-Animated Film - Upwork
item.description:
We are an award-winning animal welfare non-profit, looking for a creative video producer to design and produce a short 3D-animated film that will raise awareness about animal welfare issues and promote our  organisation's mission.

In this project you would work with our team to design an eye-catching short film depicting the journey of decapod crustaceans through their journey from sea to plate, plus the work our organisation does to get these animals legal protection and humane treatment.   

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in video production and animation, with a proven track record of creating engaging and compelling content. The producer will be responsible for developing the concept, scriptwriting, storyboarding, character design, animation, and post-production. This project requires a highly skilled and imaginative individual who can bring the story to life through visually stunning and emotive animation.

    Relevant skills include:
    - Video production
    - Animation
    - 3D modeling
    - Storyboarding
    - Scriptwriting
    - Character design
    - Post-production editing

Videos we like:  
Losing Nemo: https://www.kamielvankessel.com/The-Black-Fish-Losing-Nemo
Man: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WfGMYdalClU

We require a completed film, trailer and poster design to be used on our website, campaign material and social media. We have brand specifications available for applicants to review upon request.  

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:35 UTC
Category: 3D Animation
Skills:Video Production, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Production, Animation, Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor who can transform raw footage into engaging videos. The ideal candidate will work with the rushes we provide, which consist of a series of short videos. The final video will always be fairly short +- 30 sec, and will be broadcast on our social networks. Your role will involve editing and enhancing the footage to create polished and professional videos. Attention to detail is crucial, as you will need to ensure seamless transitions, add relevant effects, and optimize visual elements. If you have a keen eye for storytelling and can deliver high-quality videos within tight deadlines, we would love to hear from you.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Transitions and effects
- Visual optimization
- Attention to detail
- Storytelling
- Time management

Hourly Range: $5.00-$18.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 14:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
